name: Bing - Better Search Results
description: This Style converts Bing Search Results to Fresh and Cozy layout. Good for bigger screens. This style only affects search results page. For better home page experience, Go to bing settings, and enable bigger image in background.

user.name: smartsendy34
user.about: I'm a graphic and web designer from India. Love to create modern and clean layouts. These styles are my efforts to create web more beautiful, however I don't want to ditch the efforts of the original websites so keep checking the updates from Original site owners and Delete my styles if original site becomes cool.
